column4: ok so anyone got a sec to help me with with an issue. I have tryed everything from bashing my head in to apt-geting every -dev i could. http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/NgacCd0E i keep getting this issue when I have qt3 and qt4 installed.
i really think qt just hates me
killer why would you want to duel boot
just change your settings at login for which one you want
ubuntu and kubuntu on same hard disk in different partitiions
but killer....ubuntu and kubuntu are justa bout the smile minus some packages. You could just set one up with everything
then you would have kde and gnome
and all the other little packages you would need
but then gnome apps are available in kde and vice versa....its an annoyance
one set with just kde and stuff and one with just gnome
i reached my qoute on helping others anyone got a sec to beat their heads with me on qt issues?
